item.title: 在这一天：2019 年，前总统吉米-卡特成为美国历史上最长寿的行政长官；他的寿命为 94 岁零 172 天，超过了已故前总统乔治-H-W-布什。
item.description:
ON THIS DAY: In 2019 former President Jimmy Carter became the longest-living chief executive in American history; at 94 years and 172 days, he exceeded the lifespan of the late former President George H.W. Bush. https://t.co/dhUvBvsVlF pic.twitter.com/1aGhCvqlyk

— ABC News (@ABC) March 22, 2024

item.title: 一些专家说，特朗普支持的慈善机构 "边境 911"（Border911）可能 "触犯法律"，它以边境为重点推动影响选举。

item.title: "《公路豪情》问世 35 年来，已经形成了一种邪教声誉，它是一部烂到让人无法自拔的电影，让人忍不住去欣赏它，因为它在自己的糟糕中享受着无耻的快乐。这种罪恶的快感必须重启。"
item.description:
"In the 35 years since its debut, 'Road House' developed a cult reputation as a movie so bad that you couldn’t help but enjoy it for the shameless joy it took in its own awfulness. There had to be a reboot of this guilty pleasure." https://t.co/ri9Nqx62kf

— ABC News (@ABC) March 22, 2024

item.title: 一项新的分析显示，目前在美国买房要比租房贵得多，预计至少在未来五年内，房地产市场都将如此。

item.title: 内布拉斯加州的护士收养了她们在新生儿重症监护室照顾过的女婴："如果这是你的心愿，我会说去做吧，不要逃避，因为有[很多]孩子需要收养"。

item.title: 为配合世界水日而发布的《2024 年联合国世界水资源开发报告》指出，清洁、安全的水资源是我们这个世界的 "重要纽带"，对促进和平至关重要：
item.description:
Access to clean and safe water is the "great connector" of our world and critical in promoting peace, according to the 2024 U.N. World Water Development Report released to coincide with World Water Day.

Learn more: https://t.co/qpo6JbYGaz pic.twitter.com/hSaP8NHYlI

— ABC News (@ABC) March 22, 2024

item.title: 田纳西州州长比尔-李（Bill Lee）周四签署了一项立法，旨在保护词曲作者、表演者和其他音乐行业专业人士免受人工智能的潜在危险，并向该州最具代表性的居民之一致敬。
item.description:
In a nod to one of the state's most iconic residents, Tennessee Gov. Bill Lee on Thursday signed off on legislation designed to protect songwriters, performers and other music industry professionals against the potential dangers of artificial intelligence. https://t.co/wU1WhARc90 pic.twitter.com/1JhTUDTkeK

— ABC News (@ABC) March 22, 2024

item.title: 阿拉巴马州州长凯-艾维（Kay Ivey）签署了一项大刀阔斧的法案，禁止将州政府资金用于州政府机构、高等教育机构和其他公共实体的 DEI 计划和办公室。
item.description:
Alabama Gov. Kay Ivey has signed a sweeping bill that prohibits the use of state funds for DEI programs and offices at state agencies, higher education institutions and other public entities. https://t.co/vGZSqti9Em

— ABC News (@ABC) March 22, 2024

item.title: 俄克拉荷马州塔尔萨县地方检察官周四表示，不会对俄克拉荷马州少年奈克斯-本尼迪克特（Nex Benedict）在死前一天卷入的斗殴事件提出指控：
item.description:
No charges will be filed in connection with a fight that Oklahoma teen Nex Benedict was involved in a day before they died, the Tulsa County district attorney said Thursday.
